# Load data
## city, country, group, measure, and population


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

url_root <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UN-AVT/kamino-source/main/sources/0-shared/data/"
url_file <- "capital-cities/capital-cities-would-you-live-there.csv"
url <- paste0(url_root, url_file)

df <- read.csv(url, header = TRUE)
df

```


### Analytics
#### calculate top, max, min, and labels


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

#df_top <- df %>% slice_max(Population, n = 15)
#df_top

# Setting seed to repeat sample parameters
set.seed(5)
df_top <- sample_n(df, 15)

df_top$xmax <- cumsum(df_top$Population)
df_top$xmin <- df_top$xmax - df_top$Population
df_top$xlabel <- (df_top$xmax + df_top$xmin)/2
df_top$label <- paste(as.character(round(df_top$Measure, digits=0)),"%")

df_top

```


### Plot
#### geom rect, text, and hline


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide', out.width = "95%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
  text = element_text(family = "inconsolata", size = 16), 
  legend.position = "none",
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  axis.text = element_blank(),
  axis.line = element_blank(),
  axis.ticks = element_blank(),
  axis.title = element_blank(),
  panel.grid = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  panel.background=element_rect(fill="white", colour="white"),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  plot.title = element_text(color = "black", size = 14, face = "bold"),
  plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "black", size = 11),
  plot.caption = element_text(color = "#555555", size = 10),
  plot.background = element_blank(),
  plot.margin = unit(c(0.25, 0.25, 0.25, 0.25), "in")
)

group_palette <- c(
  "0. Exceeded" = "#455A64",
  "1. Within" = "#FB8C00"
)

v1 <-ggplot(df_top) +
    geom_rect(aes(ymin = 0, ymax = Measure, xmin = xmin, xmax = xmax, fill = Group), color = "white", alpha = 0.5) + 
    geom_hline(yintercept = 10, color = "#FB8C00", linetype = "dotted") +
    geom_text(aes(x = xlabel, y = Measure, label = label), vjust = -1, position = "identity", color = "black", size = 3, family = "inconsolata" ) +
    geom_richtext(aes(x = xlabel, y = 2, label = paste0("\u2195 ", Population)), size = 3.0, angle = 90, alpha = 0.8, color = "black", fill = "#FFFFFF", vjust = 0.5, hjust = 0.0, family = "inconsolata") +
    geom_text(aes(x = xlabel, y = 0, label = City), hjust = "right", vjust = 1.5, position = "identity", color = "black", size = 3.5, angle = 45, family = "inconsolata" ) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = group_palette) +
    coord_cartesian(clip="off") +
    labs(title = "Capital Cities: Would you live there?", subtitle = "height by percent above safe limits from air pollution, width by population", x = NULL, y = NULL) +
    theme_bw() +
    theme_opts

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 16, height_svg = 9,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0)))

```
